entry.title: Moved to TextDrive
entry.content: I’ve moved this site to a new host, at TextDrive. Unfortunately it didn’t do as smoothly as I’d like (all my fault, as well!). It may take a day or two to get all of the old entries imported and the other site pages loaded again. Doh!

entry.title: Markup Cleanup
entry.content: Cleaned up some stupid markup errors that were preventing the main and (so far empty) articles pages from validating as strict XHTML, I’ve also added validator tags to the bottom of the pages.

entry.title: Word Press
entry.content: As you can see the site now uses Word Press as it’s content management system. It’s going to take me a couple of days to getting around to fixing up the templates so that it looks the same as the rest of the pages here, but bear with me.

entry.title: Entry Archives Broken
entry.content: The individual entry archives seem to be screwed at the moment, since I’m planning to move over to using Word Press in a couple of days I’m not going to waste time trying to fix them right now.
